text: 2.17: 1 Zo 3.8-9Nza Krais khothɨgi tuava zɨn vov gari, nza Fhe Bakɨme nɨman, nza tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi ki. Nza maaŋ mbuav garim, nza Zudaiŋ, nza vhɨra Moses suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vui fhu Zudaiŋ, mbe khaŋ nzuai, “Nde vhɨra tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi ma. Nza maaŋ mbuav, nza khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi thi? Krais, ana nduara tɨvi mbatɨgi havharɨrgeŋ vuzvugi thi?” Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza maaŋ suanga fhu.
